caption.p:
Estimation and forecast from two different prior settings. The cyan areas denote the 95% in‐sample credible intervals of prevalence
θ
t
I
, t ≤ 9 June, and the salmon areas denote the 95% out‐sample credible intervals of the projected prevalence
Y
t
I
, t ≥ 10 June, of confirmed infectious cases. The grey and red curves denote the posterior mean and median of the prevalence
θ
t
I
, t ≥ 10 June, respectively. The vertical lines denote the landmark dates with the maximum increasing rate (green), the maximum prevalence value (purple) and the last observation (blue), respectively. [Colour figure can be viewed at wileyonlinelibrary.com]
